original: @130a * // jo bo thugs rje chen po yi ge drug pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @130a * // jo bo thugs rje chen po yi ge drug pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Lord of Great Compassion, the Six-Syllable One.🔽Now, I will explain the means of achievement that occurs in the verse:

original: de nas / bde chen shes rab snying rje mchog / ces 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas / bde chen shes rab snying rje mchog / ces 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
translated: Great bliss, supreme compassion, and wisdom,

original: bde chen stong pa nyid bdag lha //
analyzed: bde chen stong pa nyid bdag lha //
translated: The lord himself, supreme wisdom,🔽great compassion, the nature of the jewel,

original: mgon po nyid dang shes rab mchog / brtse chen rang bzhin nor bu dang // padmo 'dzin la phyag 'tshal bshad //
analyzed: mgon po nyid dang shes rab mchog / brtse chen rang bzhin nor bu dang // padmo 'dzin la phyag 'tshal bshad //
translated: and the lotus holder, I pay homage and explain.

original: rnal 'byor rgyal po shes rab thabs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rgyal po shes rab thabs //
translated: The king of yoga, wisdom and means,

original: rigs 'dzin dkyil 'khor bla na med //
analyzed: rigs 'dzin dkyil 'khor bla na med //
translated: the unsurpassed maṇḍala of the knowledge holders,

original: dpal ldan pha rol phyin drug dngos //
analyzed: dpal ldan pha rol phyin drug dngos //
translated: the glorious embodiment of the six perfections,

original: cho ga'i dam pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: cho ga'i dam pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: this excellent ritual has been taught.

original: aom ma ni padme h'um //
analyzed: aom ma ni padme h'um //
translated: Oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ.🔽The six-syllable king of secret mantras,

original: gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge drug / lugs 'byung ba dang lugs bzlog las //
analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge drug / lugs 'byung ba dang lugs bzlog las //
translated: from the forward and reverse sequences,

original: rgyud drug 'gog dang lam drug sbyong //
analyzed: rgyud drug 'gog dang lam drug sbyong //
translated: stops the six realms and purifies the six paths,

original: 'bras bu drug la rab sbyor nyid //
analyzed: 'bras bu drug la rab sbyor nyid //
translated: fully applying to the six results.

original: de bzhin rgyud drug bskyed pa dang / lam drug la ni sbyor ba dang // 'bras bu drug ni mngon du bya //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyud drug bskyed pa dang / lam drug la ni sbyor ba dang // 'bras bu drug ni mngon du bya //
translated: and the actualization of the six results

original: gzi brjid drug pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: gzi brjid drug pa zhes bshad do //
translated: are explained as the six splendors.

original: aom a'a: hr'i:h'um phat /
analyzed: aom a'a: hr'i:h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: rang bzhin gnyis med stong pa nyid //
analyzed: rang bzhin gnyis med stong pa nyid //
translated: The nondual nature is emptiness.

original: chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de //
translated: It is the characteristic of all phenomena,🔽unobstructed, clear,

original: 'gag pa med dang gsal med dang // ma bsgribs 'gro 'ong med mtshan nyid //
analyzed: 'gag pa med dang gsal med dang // ma bsgribs 'gro 'ong med mtshan nyid //
translated: unobscured, and without coming or going.

original: aom a'a:hr'i:ma ni h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i:ma ni h'um /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ maṇi hūṃ.

original: shes rab chen po dri ma med //
analyzed: shes rab chen po dri ma med //
translated: Great wisdom is stainless.

original: rnam par shes kun mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: rnam par shes kun mtshan nyid de //
translated: It is the characteristic of all consciousness,

original: ma skyes mi gnas 'gag pa med //🔽gdod nas rnam grol mngon sum pa //
analyzed: ma skyes mi gnas 'gag pa med // gdod nas rnam grol mngon sum pa //
translated: unborn, nonabiding, and unceasing.

original: aom a'a:padme h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a:padme h'um /
translated: Oṃ āḥ padme hūṃ.

original: snying rje chen po lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: snying rje chen po lhun gyis grub //
translated: Spontaneous great compassion

original: dmigs pa kun gyi mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: dmigs pa kun gyi mtshan nyid de //
translated: is the characteristic of all objects,

original: mi phyed mi 'gyur 'bral ba med //
analyzed: mi phyed mi 'gyur 'bral ba med //
translated: indivisible, unchanging, and inseparable.

original: skyo med re ba rnam spangs pa'o //
analyzed: skyo med re ba rnam spangs pa'o //
translated: Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ haṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽The yoga of all phenomena, signless like space,

original: chos kun mtshan med mkha' 'dra'i rnal 'byor dag pa la //
analyzed: chos kun mtshan med mkha' 'dra'i rnal 'byor dag pa la //
translated: is pure.

original: thugs rje'i spyan @130b bskyod padmo zla dbus gzhon nu'i sku //
analyzed: thugs rje'i spyan @130b bskyod padmo zla dbus gzhon nu'i sku //
translated: With the compassionate eye moving, in the center of a lotus and moon, the youthful form,

original: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ji bzhin phyag rgyas mtshan pa dang / de bzhin g-yas g-yon nor bu padmo 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ji bzhin phyag rgyas mtshan pa dang / de bzhin g-yas g-yon nor bu padmo 'dzin pa'o //
translated: with one face and four hands, just as marked by the seals, and likewise holding a jewel and lotus on the right and left.

original: dam tshig rdo rje lha gsum la //
analyzed: dam tshig rdo rje lha gsum la //
translated: In the three deities of the pledge vajra,

original: ye shes mkha' spyod gsum bcug la //
analyzed: ye shes mkha' spyod gsum bcug la //
translated: the three of the awareness space-goers are inserted.🔽The repetition is done by the stages of yoga,

original: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //🔽rnal 'byor rim pas bzlas par bya //
analyzed: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i // rnal 'byor rim pas bzlas par bya //
translated: common and uncommon.

original: lha yi rim pas sngags rim bzhin //
analyzed: lha yi rim pas sngags rim bzhin //
translated: The mantra stage is like the deity stage.

original: rnam gsum rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang //
analyzed: rnam gsum rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang //
translated: The stage of the perfection of the three

original: mkhas pas 'bad de bsgom par bya //
analyzed: mkhas pas 'bad de bsgom par bya //
translated: should be meditated on with effort by the wise.

original: dpal 'jig rten mgon po yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal 'jig rten mgon po yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of the glorious Six-Syllable Lokanātha is complete.
